unnormalised: Ayurveda's awesome! I tried a Panchakarma retreat in Kerala last year, around 10/10/2023. It was so rejuvenating! My dosha imbalance vanished. Dr. Sharma at the Arya Vaidya Sala was excellent. I felt like a new person after the treatment which started at 07:00 hrs daily. Definitely recommend giving it a shot! Heard good things about treatments in Rishikesh too! Maybe I'll visit in August 2024.
normalised: Ayurveda's awesome! I tried a Panchakarma retreat in Kerala last year, around tenth october two thousand and twenty three. It was so rejuvenating! My dosha imbalance vanished. Doctor Sharma at the Arya Vaidya Sala was excellent. I felt like a new person after the treatment which started at seven A M daily. Definitely recommend giving it a shot! Heard good things about treatments in Rishikesh too! Maybe I'll visit in august two thousand and twenty four.
